tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rental_properties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  bedrooms INT NOT NULL,
  bathrooms INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rental_properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    num_bedrooms INT NOT NULL,
    num_bathrooms INT NOT NULL,
    rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tenants (
    tenant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID REFERENCES rental_properties(property_id),
    tenant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RentalProperties (
  property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rental_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    available_for_rent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE rental_agreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    tenant_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    rental_duration INT,
    rental_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_properties(
    property_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rental_price DECIMAL,
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT,
    available_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE property_owners(
    owner_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
    properties_owned INT
);

CREATE TABLE tenants(
    tenant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tenant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
    current_city VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_agreements(
    agreement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT REFERENCES rental_properties(property_id),
    tenant_id INT REFERENCES tenants(tenant_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    monthly_rent DECIMAL,
    deposit DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE property_reviews(
    review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT REFERENCES rental_properties(property_id),
    tenant_id INT REFERENCES tenants(tenant_id),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
